page.title: 09LEISURE
page.content: LEISURE The most popular leisure activities of the people questioned included watching T.V,reading,sports (such as tennis,swimming,riding and squash) although some people at one farm enjoyed breeding horses.The most popular leisure activity is T.V.. People found their leisure facilities in Brewood and at Wolverhampton These leisure centres are most commonly visited monthly.A typical lady said that her hobbies were gardening,sport and T.V. The main leisure activities of their household were swimming and they go to Wolverhampton or Stafford twice a week.One family enjoyed walking as there are many public footpaths.Not many people went dancing or to youth clubs or to the cinema. Mainly working people(adults) live in this area.
